Installation
============

pip install fastapi-jsonrpc

Development
===========

1. Install poetry

    https://github.com/sdispater/poetry#installation

2. Update dependencies

.. code:: bash

    poetry update

3. Install dependencies

.. code:: bash

    poetry install

4. Install dephell

.. code:: bash

    pip install dephell

5. Regenerate setup.py

.. code:: bash

    dephell deps convert
